SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.block.protection

接口 ArtisanBlockProtection

public interface ArtisanBlockProtection
Block protection check service, used to verify player interaction permissions at specified locations.

This service is a core security mechanism. All operations involving block breaking, placing, and interaction must go through this interface for permission verification. Built-in implementations integrate with major protection plugins (such as WorldGuard, GriefPrevention) to ensure compatibility with the server ecosystem.

Add-on plugin development requirements:

  1. Must call this interface method for permission checking before implementing any block operation logic
  2. Ignoring permission checks will cause:
    - Conflicts with other protection plugins
    - Players bypassing territory permissions
    - Security vulnerabilities
另请参阅:
  • Get service instance

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    boolean
    canBreak(@NotNull Player player, @NotNull Location location)
    Checks if a player can break a block at the specified location
    boolean
    canInteract(@NotNull Player player, @NotNull Location location)
    Checks if a player can interact with a block at the specified location (such as opening containers)
    boolean
    canPlace(@NotNull Player player, @NotNull Location location)
    Checks if a player can place a block at the specified location

  • 方法详细资料

    • canBreak

      boolean canBreak(@NotNull @NotNull Player player, @NotNull @NotNull Location location)
      Checks if a player can break a block at the specified location
      参数:
      player - the operating player (non-null)
      location - the block location (non-null)
      返回:
      true if the player has break permission, false otherwise

    • canPlace

      boolean canPlace(@NotNull @NotNull Player player, @NotNull @NotNull Location location)
      Checks if a player can place a block at the specified location
      参数:
      player - the operating player (non-null)
      location - the target location (non-null)
      返回:
      true if the player has place permission, false otherwise

    • canInteract

      boolean canInteract(@NotNull @NotNull Player player, @NotNull @NotNull Location location)
      Checks if a player can interact with a block at the specified location (such as opening containers)
      参数:
      player - the operating player (non-null)
      location - the block location (non-null)
      返回:
      true if the player has interaction permission, false otherwise
